name: cypress-localstorage-commands
description: Extends Cypress' cy commands with localStorage methods. Allows preserving localStorage between tests
author: Javier Brea

scripts.install:all: npm run test:e2e:cypress-typescript:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-9:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-9-no-plugin:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest-no-plugin:install
scripts.lint:typescript: cd test-e2e/cypress-typescript && npm run copy:library && npm run lint
scripts.lint:javascript: eslint src test test-e2e/app test-e2e/cypress-9 test-e2e/cypress-9-no-plugin test-e2e/cypress-latest test-e2e/cypress-latest-no-plugin test-e2e/specs *.js
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:javascript && npm run lint:typescript
scripts.lint: npm run install:all && npm run lint:all
scripts.test:e2e:cypress-9:ci: npm run test:e2e:cypress-9:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-9
scripts.test:e2e:cypress-9-no-plugin:ci: npm run test:e2e:cypress-9-no-plugin:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-9-no-plugin
scripts.test:e2e:cypress-latest:ci: npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest
scripts.test:e2e:cypress-latest-no-plugin:ci: npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest-no-plugin:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest-no-plugin
scripts.test:e2e:cypress-typescript:ci: npm run test:e2e:cypress-typescript:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-typescript
scripts.test:e2e: npm run test:e2e:app:install && npm run test:e2e:cypress-9:ci && npm run test:e2e:cypress-9-no-plugin:ci && npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest:ci && npm run test:e2e:cypress-latest-no-plugin:ci && npm run test:e2e:cypress-typescript:ci
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:unit && npm run test:mutation && npm run test:e2e
